alert.note: Alert for Brantley; Pierce; Ware (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 15 at 5:59PM EDT until July 15 at 6:30PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jacksonville has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Pierce County in southeastern Georgia... West central Brantley County in southeastern Georgia... Northeastern Ware County in southeastern Georgia... * Until 630 PM EDT. * At 559 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Braganza, or near Waycross, moving northwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Waycross, Blackshear, Boggy Bay, Jamestown, Pebble Hill, Braganza, Fort Mudge and Needham. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
